languages.text: "Но за цветением прятался тлен. Богатство развратило нас, роскошь прельстила нас своими грязными обещаниями. Жители планеты уже не хотели молиться и работать, а хотели лишь развлекаться и предаваться опасным философиям. Тысяча скверных ересей и миллион греховных пороков завелись на моем мире, как плесень на протеиновом брикете".

traits.locale_text: "Но за цветением прятался тлен. Богатство развратило нас, роскошь прельстила нас своими грязными обещаниями. Жители планеты уже не хотели молиться и работать, а хотели лишь развлекаться и предаваться опасным философиям. Тысяча скверных ересей и миллион греховных пороков завелись на моем мире, как плесень на протеиновом брикете".

languages.text: "But the bloom was a veneer for rot. Opulence had depraved us, and luxury had seduced us with its sordid promises. The planet's denizens no longer wished to pray or work, they only sought entertainment and dangerous philosophies. A thousand vile heresies and a million appalling vices bred on my world like mould on a nutribar."
languages.original_text: "Но за цветением прятался тлен. Богатство развратило нас, роскошь прельстила нас своими грязными обещаниями. Жители планеты уже не хотели молиться и работать, а хотели лишь развлекаться и предаваться опасным философиям. Тысяча скверных ересей и миллион греховных пороков завелись на моем мире, как плесень на протеиновом брикете".

traits.locale_text: "But the bloom was a veneer for rot. The opulence had depraved us, the luxury had seduced us with its sordid promises. The planet's denizens no longer wished to pray or work, they only sought entertainment and dangerous philosophies. A thousand vile heresies and a million sinful vices bred on my world like mold on a nutribar."

"But the bloom was a veneer for rot. The opulence had depraved us, the luxury had seduced us with its sordid promises. The planet's denizens no longer wished to pray or work, they only sought entertainment and dangerous philosophies. A thousand vile heresies and a million sinful vices bred on my world like mold on a nutribar."

"But the bloom was a veneer for rot. Opulence had depraved us, and luxury had seduced us with its sordid promises. The planet's denizens no longer wished to pray or work, they only sought entertainment and dangerous philosophies. A thousand vile heresies and a million sinful vices bred on my world like mould on a nutribar."

"But the bloom was a veneer for rot. Opulence had depraved us, and luxury had seduced us with its sordid promises. The planet's denizens no longer wished to pray or work, they only sought entertainment and dangerous philosophies. A thousand vile heresies and a million sinful vices bred on my world like mould on a nutribar."

"But the bloom was a veneer for rot. Opulence had depraved us, and luxury had seduced us with its sordid promises. The planet's denizens no longer wished to pray or work, they only sought entertainment and dangerous philosophies. A thousand vile heresies and a million appalling vices bred on my world like mould on a nutribar."

languages.text: “可繁荣不过是腐朽的外衣罢了。富裕让我们自甘堕落，奢华的生活以肮脏的承诺引诱着我们。后来，那颗行星的居民不再祈祷，也不再工作，只想寻求娱乐与危险的思想。几千种卑鄙的异端邪说、几万种令人发指的陋习在我的世界中生根发芽，就像营养条上的霉菌一样。”
languages.original_text: "But the bloom was a veneer for rot. Opulence had depraved us, and luxury had seduced us with its sordid promises. The planet's denizens no longer wished to pray or work, they only sought entertainment and dangerous philosophies. A thousand vile heresies and a million appalling vices bred on my world like mould on a nutribar."

traits.locale_text: “可繁荣不过是腐朽的外衣罢了。富裕让我们自甘堕落，奢华的生活以肮脏的承诺引诱着我们。后来，那颗行星的居民不再祈祷，也不再工作，只想寻求娱乐与危险的思想。几千种卑鄙的异端邪说、几万种邪恶的陋习在我的世界中生根发芽，就像营养条上的霉菌一样。”

languages.text: «Sin embargo, el ascenso era un regalo envenenado. La opulencia nos terminó por corromper, y los lujos nos sedujeron con promesas despreciables. Los habitantes del planeta ya no querían rezar ni trabajar: solo buscaban entretenimiento y filosofías peligrosas. En mi mundo brotaron miles de herejías y millones de vicios espantosos, como brota el moho en la comida abandonada».
languages.original_text: "But the bloom was a veneer for rot. Opulence had depraved us, and luxury had seduced us with its sordid promises. The planet's denizens no longer wished to pray or work, they only sought entertainment and dangerous philosophies. A thousand vile heresies and a million appalling vices bred on my world like mould on a nutribar."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, el ascenso era un regalo envenenado. La opulencia nos terminó por corromper, y los lujos nos sedujeron con promesas despreciables. Los habitantes del planeta ya no querían rezar ni trabajar: solo buscaban entretenimiento y filosofías peligrosas. En mi mundo brotaron miles de herejías y millones de vicios pecaminosos, como brota el moho en la comida abandonada».

languages.text: 「しかし、発展は腐敗の裏返しだったのです。豊かさは我々を堕落させ、贅沢は卑しい約束で我々を誘惑した。惑星の住民はもはや祈ることも働くことも望まず、娯楽と危険な哲学だけを求めました。千の下劣な異端と百万の罪深い悪徳が、栄養剤に生えるカビのように惑星に繁殖しました」
languages.original_text: "But the bloom was a veneer for rot. Opulence had depraved us, and luxury had seduced us with its sordid promises. The planet's denizens no longer wished to pray or work, they only sought entertainment and dangerous philosophies. A thousand vile heresies and a million appalling vices bred on my world like mould on a nutribar."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、発展は腐敗の裏返しだったのです。豊かさは我々を堕落させ、贅沢は卑しい約束で我々を誘惑した。惑星の住民はもはや祈ることも働くことも望まず、娯楽と危険な哲学だけを求めました。千の下劣な異端と百万の罪深い悪徳が、栄養剤に生えるカビのように惑星に繁殖しました」

languages.text: "Aber die Blüte war nur Staffage für Fäulnis. Die Opulenz hatte uns verdorben, und die elenden Versprechungen des Luxus hatten uns verführt. Die Bewohner des Planeten wollten nicht länger beten oder arbeiten, sie suchten nur nach Unterhaltung und gefährlichen Philosophien. Tausend üble Ketzereien und eine Million sündige Laster wuchsen auf meiner Welt wie Schimmel auf einem Nutririegel."
languages.original_text: "But the bloom was a veneer for rot. Opulence had depraved us, and luxury had seduced us with its sordid promises. The planet's denizens no longer wished to pray or work, they only sought entertainment and dangerous philosophies. A thousand vile heresies and a million appalling vices bred on my world like mould on a nutribar."

traits.locale_text: "Aber die Blüte war nur Staffage für Fäulnis. Die Opulenz hatte uns verdorben, und die elenden Versprechungen des Luxus hatten uns verführt. Die Bewohner des Planeten wollten nicht länger beten oder arbeiten, sie suchten nur nach Unterhaltung und gefährlichen Philosophien. Tausend üble Ketzereien und eine Million sündige Laster wuchsen auf meiner Welt wie Schimmel auf einem Nutririegel."

languages.text: « Mais cet essor fulgurant cachait un mal plus profond. L'opulence nous avait corrompus, et le luxe nous avait séduits avec ses promesses sordides. Les habitants de ma planète ne souhaitaient plus prier ni travailler. Ils ne rêvaient que de loisirs et s'adonnaient à des philosophies dangereuses. Les hérésies et les vices, tous plus immondes les uns que les autres, se sont multipliés dans mon monde aussi vite que la moisissure sur une nutribarre. »
languages.original_text: "But the bloom was a veneer for rot. Opulence had depraved us, and luxury had seduced us with its sordid promises. The planet's denizens no longer wished to pray or work, they only sought entertainment and dangerous philosophies. A thousand vile heresies and a million appalling vices bred on my world like mould on a nutribar."

traits.locale_text: « Mais cet essor fulgurant cachait un mal plus profond. L'opulence nous avait corrompus, et le luxe nous avait séduits avec ses promesses sordides. Les habitants de ma planète ne souhaitaient plus prier ni travailler. Ils ne rêvaient que de loisirs et s'adonnaient à des philosophies dangereuses. Les hérésies et les vices, tous plus amoraux les uns que les autres, se sont multipliés dans mon monde aussi vite que la moisissure sur une nutribarre. »

languages.text: "Servetimiz, çürümüşlüğü maskeleyen bir cilaydı ama. Bolluk, ahlakımızı bozmuş; lüks yaşamın menfur vaatlerine kapılıp gitmiştik. Gezegende yaşayanlar artık ne dua etmek ne de çalışmak istiyordu, yalnızca eğlence ve tehlikeli felsefe peşindeydiler. Binlerce iğrenç kâfirlik ve milyonlarca dehşet verici ahlaksızlık, besinbarda biriken küfler gibi dünyamda türeyivermişti."
languages.original_text: "But the bloom was a veneer for rot. Opulence had depraved us, and luxury had seduced us with its sordid promises. The planet's denizens no longer wished to pray or work, they only sought entertainment and dangerous philosophies. A thousand vile heresies and a million appalling vices bred on my world like mould on a nutribar."

traits.locale_text: "Servetimiz, çürümüşlüğü maskeleyen bir cilaydı ama. Zenginliğimiz, ahlakımızı bozdu ve lüks, iğrenç vaatlerle bizi baştan çıkardı. Gezegende yaşayanlar artık dua etmek ya da çalışmak istemiyordu, yalnızca eğlence ve tehlikeli felsefeler arayışındaydılar. Binlerce alçak kâfirlik ve milyonlarca dehşet verici ahlaksızlık, besinbarda biriken küfler gibi dünyamda türedi."
